org.beanfabrics.swing.table
Class BnTableSelectionModel

java.lang.Object
  org.beanfabrics.swing.table.BnTableSelectionModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.ListSelectionModel
public class BnTableSelectionModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.ListSelectionModel

The BnTableSelectionModel is a ListSelectionModel that decorates a IListPM.

Author:
Michael Karneim
